text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 2000. ==Events== *14 September - The Italian version of Big Brother debuts. *21 December - The first season of Grande Fratello is won by Cristina Plevani. ==Debuts== ===Domestic=== *14 September - Grande Fratello (Canale 5) (2000–present) ===International=== *6 January - Futurama (Italia 1) (1999–2013) *7 April - Kipper (Italia 1) (1997–2000) *11 June - Buffy, the Vampire Slayer (Italia 1) (1997–2003) *4 August - / Dragon Tales (Italia 1) (1999–2005) *17 September - Oggy and the Cockroaches (Italia 1) (1998–present) *16 October - The Powerpuff Girls (Rai 2) (1998–2005) */ Ed, Edd 'n Eddy (Cartoon Network) (1999–2009) * The New Woody Woodpecker Show (Italia 1) (1999–2002) ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== *Momenti di gloria (1999-2000) ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *2000 in Italy *List of Italian films of 2000
title: 2000 in Italian television
